hero.title: Your Financial Future, Our Expertise
hero.subtitle: Igor Sigatinski is an experienced financial advisor specializing in real estate, insurance, and project investments.

about.title: About Igor Sigatinski
about.subtitle: Igor Sigatinski is an experienced financial and real estate advisor with a proven track record of helping clients achieve their financial goals. With extensive experience in real estate mortgage brokerage, credit mediation, real estate brokerage, and insurance, Igor provides a comprehensive suite of services tailored to meet the unique needs of each client.
about.mission_text: My mission is to provide clients with independent, equitable advice, ensuring their interests are always at the forefront. I believe in transparency, integrity, and a customer-centric approach that excludes any fund influences to maintain objectivity and trust.
about.philosophy_text: My philosophy centers on the provision of unbiased financial and real estate advice. By working independently and avoiding fund affiliations, I can provide advice that is solely geared towards the success and financial well-being of the clients. This approach fosters long-term relationships built on trust and mutual respect.
